memberdef.argsstring: (self, str text="", str placeholder="", int x=0, int y=0, int width=200, int height=50)
memberdef.name: __init__

para.verbatim: Draw the input box and its components.
Track the input box events.
Update the input box and its components.
Refresh the input box and its components.

Internal method for calculating how and when to scroll text when going beyond the input box. I am aware of how awful it is. Why? because O(n). What does that mean? the larger the text, the slower it gets! Very bad! Might not be that noticeable for small strings, but still... TODO: Make it better, fool.
Authorise only ASCII characters in the input box, then return the input box itself.
Authorise only numerical values (0-9) in the input box, then return the input box itself.
Authorise only alphanumerical values (a-zA-Z0-9-_), then return the input box itself. This includes dashes (hyphens) and underscores.
Return whether the user's mouse cursor is hovering over the input box or not.
Return whether the input box is selected or not.
Center the input box horizontally relative to the specified parent, then return the input box itself.
Center the input box vertically relative to the specified parent, then return the input box itself.

memberdef.argsstring: (self, int parent_x, int parent_y, int parent_width, int parent_height)
memberdef.name: center

para.verbatim: Center the input box on both axes relative to the specified parent, then return the input box itself.

memberdef.argsstring: (self, int parent_x, int parent_y, int parent_width, int parent_height, int x, int y)
memberdef.name: center_with_offset

para.verbatim: Center the input box with center() and offset it by x and y relative to the specified parent, then return the input box itself.
Set the width of the input box, then return the input box itself.
Return the width of the input box.
Set the height of the input box, then return the input box itself.
Return the height of the input box.

Set the input box's max text length, then return the input box itself.

Class for creating an input box.
